title: Lovin’ You Tonight
lyrics:
[Intro: Puff Daddy, 
The Notorious B.I.G.
, 
R. Kelly
]
Uh, I like that
You like that? Ha
Here's another one
 (And another one)
And another one
 (And another one)
Uh (
Oh, yeah
)
What, what
 (Come on)
[Chorus: R Kelly & 
The Notorious B.I.G.
]
You must be used to me spending (uh, uh)
And all that sweet wining and dining
Well, I'm loving you tonight
Uh, here's another one
 (Oh)
And another one
 (Oh)
Uh, uh, what
[Verse 1: The Notorious B.I.G., 
Puff Daddy
]
Some say the X, make the sex spec-tacular
Make me lick you from your neck to your back, then ya
Shivering, tongue delivering
Chills up that spine, that *** is mine
Skip the wine and the candlelight, no Cristal tonight
If it's all right with you, we ****** (That's cool)
Déjà vu, the blunts sparked, finger ******* in the park
Pissy off Bacardi Dark
Remember when I used to play between your legs?
You begged for me to stop because you know where it would head
Straight to your mother's bed
Not the Marriott, we'd be lucky if we find a spot
Next to your sister — damn, I really missed the
Way she used to rub my back, when I hit that
Way she used to giggle when your *** would wiggle
Now I know you're used to suites at the Parker Meridien
Trips to the Caribbean, but tonight, no ends (
Uh-uh
)

The Notorious B.I.G.
, 
Puff Daddy
]
You must be used to me spending (
Uh
)
You must be used to me (
Uh
) (
Come on
)
And all that sweet wining and dining (
What
)
(Wining and dining, baby)
Well, I'm loving you tonight
Here's another one
 (****ing you tonight)
And another one
 (No doubt, baby)
And another one
 (****ng you)
What! What! Uh
You must be used to me spending
(You must be, yeah)
You must be! (
Uh, uh
)
And all that sweet wining and dining
Well, I'm loving you tonight
Here's another one
 (****ing you)
And another one
 (no doubt about it baby, ****ing you)
Uh, uh
[Verse 2: The Notorious B.I.G.]
Yeah, you look fine
Like a wide face Rolex, you just shine
I like that waistline
Let me hit that from behind — which wall you wanna climb?
My style genuine — girl, I love you long time
I got you pinned up with your ****ing limbs up
All because you like the way my Benz was rimmed up
Mami, keep yo' chin up, please watch me do thee
Nasty, like it when you make it move fast, mami
I like it when you tro' it pon me
No love making, strictly back breaking
Cease know, all his **** go to my door
Then they go to his flo' to **** some more
So no, caviar, Shark Bar, uh-uh
Strictly sex that's sweaty and leftover spaghetti
I know you used to slow CDs and Dom P's
But tonight it's eight tracks and six-packs while I hit that

[Chorus: R. Kelly, 
Puff Daddy
]
You must be used to me spending
(You must be, used to me)
And all that sweet wining and dining

Can you feel me? 'Cause I can feel you
Can you feel me? 'Cause I can feel you
You must be used to me spending
(You must be used to me)

R. Kelly, take me to the bridge

Puff Daddy
]
Let's stop the ********, baby
Let me take you to the spot, get you hot
So you wanna be with me (
Say what?
)
And Puff Daddy (
That's right
)
B.I.G. (
Let's go
), bring that *** to me

Puff Daddy
]

(You must be used to me spending)
And all that sweet wining and dining

 (Make you feel so right)
'Cause I can feel you

Can you feel me?
 (You must be)
You must be used to me spending (Oh)
Can you feel me? 'Cause I can feel you
And all that sweet wining and dining
Well, I'm loving you tonight
(I'm doing it, baby; I'm doing it, baby
I'm doing it, baby, yeah, whoa, oh-oh)

[Outro: R. Kelly]
You must be used to me spending
(You must be, babe, used to me, darling)
And all that sweet wining and dining
(Spending money all of the time on you)

(Well, I'm ****ing you tonight

Giving it to you any way I possibly can)

(Ooh baby, sugar, honey)
